name: Aela the Huntress

aspects.high_concept: Master Archer and Werewolf of the Circle
other_aspects: Blood of the Beast Runs Strong
Never Backs Down from a Challenge
The Huntress Never Misses Her Mark

stunts: Master Archer: +2 to Shoot at long range, can make called shots
Hunter's Instinct: +2 to Notice when tracking prey or sensing danger
Werewolf Transformation: Can transform into werewolf form (separate stat block)
Pack Tactics: +2 to Fight when fighting alongside other Companions or wolves
Never Miss: Once per session, automatically succeed on a crucial Shoot roll
notes: Aela is a master archer and proud member of the Companions' Inner Circle. She embraces her werewolf nature and has no interest in curing it. Fierce, confident, and dedicated to the hunt.

relationships.Kodlak Whitemane: Respected Harbinger, though disagrees about the beast blood

quests: Can marry after completing Companions questline

personality_notes.speaking_style: Confident, direct, challenging. Speaks with pride about hunting and the Companions. Disdainful of weakness.
motivations: Honor the Companions and their traditions
Embrace and celebrate the beast blood
fears: Losing the beast blood (considers it a gift)
The Companions becoming weak or civilized
Being captured by the Silver Hand

werewolf_form.transformation: Can transform once per day (or more with training)
limitations: Must feed on corpses to extend time
special_abilities: Howl of Terror: Frighten nearby enemies

recruitment.greeting: Need someone to watch your back? I'm always ready for a good hunt.

beast_blood_discussion.greeting: The beast blood is a gift, not a curse. It makes us stronger, faster, better hunters.

responses.option: It's a curse we should cure

high_loyalty.dialogue: You're a true hunter. I'd follow you into any battle.
benefits: Offers werewolf blood if not already transformed

post_cure.dialogue: You gave up the gift? I can't understand that, but I respect your choice. The hunt goes on.

companion_mechanics.combat_style: Ranged DPS - focuses on archery, switches to melee when necessary
companion_mechanics.preferred_tactics: Hang back with bow, provide covering fire, engage in melee if overwhelmed
special_abilities: Can transform into werewolf during combat (if enabled)
companion_mechanics.werewolf_combat: Becomes aggressive melee powerhouse, charges enemies, uses claws

branching_interactions.companions_questline: Central character, part of Inner Circle

accept.dialogue: Welcome to the Circle. The hunt begins!

refuse.dialogue: Your loss. The offer stands if you change your mind.
refuse.note: Can still join Companions but with less respect

help_cure.dialogue: Kodlak wanted this. I'll help, but I'm keeping my gift.

marriage_proposal.dialogue: You and me? I like the idea. Let's make it official.

story_hooks: Part of ancient Nord warrior tradition
Lost Skjor, her mentor and lover
Will never cure her beast blood
One of the few who can give werewolf blood

special_mechanics.werewolf_ally: If both player and Aela are werewolves, can hunt together in beast form
